website_summaries.verdict: A grill equipped with three stainless steel burners,  Porcelain enamel-coated griddle offers 316 square inches of cooking area.
pros: Large cooking area big enough to cook 15 pancakes at once
Piezoelectric ignition system makes barbecuing easy
Good for camping, picnics, tailgate parties, camping, or nights on the patio
Porcelain coating makes cleanup a breeze
cons: Cooking is iffy, with hot and cold spots common
Unit isn't exactly level when cooking
May need to be sprayed with cooking oil each time

customer_reviews.title: I should have got one of these a long time ago we just love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is my first flat top griddle. I should have got one of these a long time ago we just love it. I do have some issues with the quality of the griddle, nothing stopping it from working but it has a wobble in the griddle cooking surface. I contacted their customer service group and they are fantastic. They shipped out a replacement griddle right away. the only problem is the replacement has the same defects. They explained it must be a manufacturing defect and please accept the apologizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for cooking multiple items at one time
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for cooking multiple items at one time. I have used this grill 6 times in 2 weeks. I feed 9 people during hoilday season and had food left over. It holds more than you think. It will cook omelets and 2 lbs of bacon a quickly as you want it to. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better grease try coating
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if the had used the porcelain enamel or powder paint coating on the grease tray. Attached is a picture after 5 or 6 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Weis

customer_reviews.title: Ours had a faulty regulator and the surface chipped
customer_reviews.text: Returning, as ours had faulty tubing or a bad regulator and would go in and out. It either had flame but it wasn't blue, or if you had more than one burner on the pressure would decrease. Also the grill surface leaves black specks in our food, which is no good if it's the non stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Biss Kistler

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This unit barely gets hot, the flames are very low and had to keep One burner off just so the other side would get hot enough. All Three burners on and it was like a simmer instead of a boil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service? I don't think they have one!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this with excitement. After receiving and set up the top chipped on first burn. So upset. Called the 1-800 number 4 times leaving all my info with no call back. Wanted to work it out with the company before posting a negative review but that's what the deserve at this point! Hopefully Amazon will take care of this.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean porcelain coated griddle with three burners!
customer_reviews.text: I always enjoy outside cooking, and needed a griddle to prepare such things as eggs, veggies, and fish. The Royal Gormet 3 burner grill with porcelain coated griddle fullfills that job perfectly. My first "griddling" was scallops, shrimp, and brussel spouts. All foods came out grate as I can adjust the griddle temperature in three separate zones. Oil or grease handling is pretty easy, make sure the griddle is perfectly level, except the waste hole could be larger. The catcher tray locking mechanism could be designed a little better as well, but works perfectly. The Griddle is an excellent value for someone who will use it regularly and clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob@Kaylahaus

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. I have cooked all kinds of food ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I have cooked all kinds of food on it. It is large enough to cook for large groups if needed but small enough to store inside my home. The heat is pretty even. The back of the griddle does get hotter than the front but the heat deflector does a good job of balancing it out. I looked at several griddles before picking this one. All things considered this was the best choice for me. You will enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: heavyd

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got his for my husband for Father’s Day. He loves it! When we camp, he likes to get up and make a big breakfast. He said the clean up is easy with this. I gave it 4 stars for temperature control because the back tends to cook higher than the front. 4 stars for assembly because while it was easy to assemble, one of the legs in the back did not screw in easily and the end of the screw came through the bottom of the leg. The drip pan is great, but be careful it does not overflow.
customer_reviews.author: Salena Weed

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband since the griddle is all the rage. Very bad decision on my behalf. Now it just sits on the back deck gathering dust. First of all its a B@@ch to clean, even if you use oil. Second there is no way to adjust the flame. What you see is what you get no matter which way you turn the knobs. No matter what I did to reduce the flame is burned hot & made cooking a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kelly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Griddle is not flat, seller will not help. Don’t buy it, buy a Blackstone.
customer_reviews.author: julie E.

customer_reviews.title: What a great griddle!
customer_reviews.text: I was discouraged from buying this by 2 relatives who said it would be too small . They have to wheel their big heavy griddles close to the house. They don't use them very often. I use mine many times a week as I have it set up just outide my back door. I am able to feed 6 people steaks and a big pile of grilled onions. I fry bacon on it. Fish are wonderful. I rarely use the third burner unless prepping for 6/8 people. The griddle is so easy to clean and it ignites on the first try with the starter. It comes with a nice cover. I am really delighted with this great griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S..

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean. I bought this to make tacos at a wedding. It did the job, I left it dirty for a month. When I needed to use it again, I was worried it would never clean up, thanks to the non stick coating. Soap and water took the month old baked on grease right off. It seems to sip propane and I can fit a lot of taco meat on it at a time. Two family members bought them to keep in their rv's after using mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute wonderful item this is. This is a very well built, sturdy and an incredible value for ALL of your cooking needs. I bought this for RVing since I love cooking outside instead of in. This griddle is not like your cheesy combination tailgater grill/griddles. (I won't mention any brand names) The griddle cook surfacve weighs at least 10 pounds alone. There are three burners that heat this up and let me tell you, whether its hash browns, pancakes, burgers or brats this griddle does an absolute great job. I actually can't say enough about this griddle. I would HIGHLY recommend this product and I don't say this to often. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Just1dude

customer_reviews.title: Only uses big propane tanks
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed to find that I couldn’t use the little green tanks like my coleman stove takes because we took it camping but other than that it’s been great. It’s heavy duty and except for a few inches at very front, has even cooking. We have done pancakes burger bacon sausage and scrambled eggs (harder with the flat top but worked. Has a decent size grease trap that handled bacon and burgers for a big family. The cover is just a cover, not a bag, so it’s designed to sit and stay in one place not be taken camping like we got it for.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Built like a commercial Unit.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this griddle. Griddle is made out of heavy steel. It has a baked porcelain coating. It handles the use of stainless steel tools. Its non stick if you spray a light coat of spray on oil. The griddle cleans up easily. Easy to use. Like all outdoor stoves. Wind can be a factor. When the wind kicks up. Put foil around the edge of the grill top or use something to block the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grill
customer_reviews.text: So far very good With the 3 burners you can regulate the heat hot on one side for meats and home fries Cooler on the other side for eggs and pan cakes .It cooks very well and the grill is nice and heavy with a good coating So far I am extremely happy with it Also it comes ready to hook up to a 20 pound propane tank Most small grills are made to hook up to a one pound propane canister which is okay if you like that I would rather have it hook to a 20 lb tank They I will maybe not run out the whole season
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Cavallo

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but modification needed right out of box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He’s used it several times and really likes it. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because when he opened it and put it together the drip pan wouldn’t stay in. No matter what we did, it slid out. Clearly that’s an issue. My husband was able to make a modification and bend the piece of metal where it sits so that it stopped flying out. I don’t think something brand new and out of the box should require modifications no matter how big of small. Hopefully that’s the only modification we’ll have to make going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good grill
customer_reviews.text: I Don't know what happend, when i was cooking suddenly i felt a strange smell, when i observe, the flame was coming off the grill and ir das burnig the paint of the grill. Ir was like that for a while, ayer that, the flame become yo normal. Good force in the flame, Outside le that, I love this grill
customer_reviews.author: Esly

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Owner's manual says clean the top with soap and water. I was hoping for dishwasher safe. I went to their website, grillshouse.com, to look at product literature and found it was selling for $109.99 which is less than I paid Amazon back in early April.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Solid Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Will not use until spring but ruggedness, fit and finish are excellent. I have noticed other reviewers complained about the grill rocking but it appears to me it is intentional to allow the user to guide the grease into the catch basins before it spills into the burner system. If it is annoying there appears to be a way to position the griddle top to prevent it. A close look at the standoffs on the bottom of the griddle will make the fix apparent. I have no reservations about this griddle based on its construction.
customer_reviews.author: Neverhome

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This Grill
customer_reviews.text: I sat this on top of my flat top kitchen stove under the ventilation, I feel like I am cooking in a restaurant now ha ha I absolutely love this grill, yes it attaches to a gas tank but I set the gas tank under my kitchen sink so you cannot see it and drilled a hole in the door In a notch ( if you can visualize - I also unhook it and take it with me in my RV camping for cooking pancakes and hamburgers or anything we want
customer_reviews.author: Candy D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these 3 times now and am very happy with the performance. The real test was Christmas day cooking bacon for 12 and this grill took care of it no problem at all. Next time I go to camp this will definitely be taking this, as I hate cooking inside the RV due to the heat and the mess. I sat it on a portable metal table I had worked out to be a nice height.
customer_reviews.author: Sam_R_TX

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be more happy with it. This is an awesome griddle grill. We've cooked everything on it so far. Steaks, hamburgers, hot dogs and quesadillas. We've had breakfast on it every weekend: sausage, eggs (scrambled & fried), bacon, pancakes, breakfast burritos, etc. Clean up is so easy. Looking forward to making some Chinese fried chicken and rice on it soon. If you love to grill like we do, I would recommend this grill. 👍😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shanna P.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GRIDDLE AT A GREAT PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is a fantastic buy, easy to assemble and very well built. Used a standard 20lb propane bottle, which i prefer over the small 2lb bottles. A 3 burner is the way to go for cooking large or small meals. It also came with a nice cover for it when not in use. I shopped around for a long time for one like this that I could afford...and this griddle is a real winner at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Reliable griddle.
customer_reviews.text: So far, easy to use and clean, and gets hot fast. Only thing to consider is that surface ends up probably hotter than you'd expect so things which require lower heat don't work as well. Ex.: Bacon, burgers, and pupusas worked fine but French toast was still a little raw inside as didn't have enough time to thoroughly cook before outside was almost burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY HUSBAND LOVES THIS GRIDDLE!
customer_reviews.text: As a regular outdoor bbq’r, my husband absolutely LOVES the 17x22 inch griddle surface. You can see by the photo that this griddle can handle a lot of food to be cooked. The sear on the salmon and shrimp really makes the flavor pop.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: Large propane
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to go out for our first family camping trip and I'm so grateful we had it. It does take a full large propane tank. So that's a little extra to pack but it cooks very well. If you've ever seen Mongolian Barbecue cooked you can clean this the same way. It does take a little scrubbing at the end but overall it was a wonderful asset to our trip!
customer_reviews.author: donyala78

customer_reviews.title: A new way of cooking for me.
customer_reviews.text: As a first time user of griddle cooking, I am sold on this product. The cooking surface is large enough to cook two or three items simultaneously. It has an enameled cooking surface which seems to distribute the heat evenly to all areas of the surface. My infrared thermometer shows a 10-15 degree difference when all burners are set to the same position. I have a traditional charcoal grill, smoker and now a griddle. In my 80 years (much of it cooking) never have I been this excited about outdoor cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Harris

customer_reviews.title: All You Need For Camping...
customer_reviews.text: ...well and maybe a tent or camper. Love this. We used to bring a Weber Q and skillet for pancakes, eggs, etc. which was a Pain in the butt. This thing is great for whatever you want to cook. We even made boboli pizza with it. The trick was to preheat an iron frying pan lid on this skillet then pop the pizza under it for 10 minutes. Easy to clean and came with everything you need to connect to you full-size propane tank. And it came with a cover. Can’t say enough good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LBZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Lots of cooking room. Love the porcelain top, no issues scratching even with metal tools. The grilled vegetables alone are worth the cost and the effort No complaints. Ordered another for my son in law. The burners could crank out more heat but they're adequate to grill a couple big T-bones together. Clean up easy.
customer_reviews.author: typhooontom

customer_reviews.title: Great value for cooking on the go
customer_reviews.text: The 1st 2 times I cooked in it, I had to adjust to hot and cool spots. Knowing where they are and how to utilize actually worked in my favor, but make no mistake, it does NOT heat evenly. Relatively easy to clean, but need to be mindful of its coating. Not as durable as my competing brand I use at home. This unit stays in our RV
customer_reviews.author: matthew r merry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be non stick but no matter what heat you have it set on it is the most stickiest surface you could cook on. It’s like they put a layer of glue down on the cooking surface and called it non stick. You can even use oil on it and low temperature heat and it will still stick no matter what food your cooking. The heat is isn’t even so one side will cook hotter or cooler even if the flames are set the same. I wouldn’t ever buy anything like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gates

customer_reviews.title: Dented and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Bought for camping this weekend. Opened it up and found it is dented and non stick top has missing non stick coating on right back corner. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I waited to long to get the black rock griddle in time but I'm happy I did it was simple to put together the top is thick and heats up well and doesn't have hot spots and the top is also super easy to clean just wipe it out with a paper towel before it cools and you are good to go
customer_reviews.author: alex schinke

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged but works great.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed after opening the box the packing material was broken in many places.it was easy to put together.the front corner of the metal was damaged and metal by propane hose was damaged.the grill works great.made eggs.sausage.and hash browns.nothing stuck and cleanup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent griddle so far...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this griddle a few times since delivery and really enjoying it. The griddle itself is very sturdy and heavy making up most of the weight as the stove is fairly light compared to the griddle. Heats fast, though the edges stay cooler and cleans easily. Great table top griddle. Exactly what I was looking for up to this point and price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: M D McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Superb out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Quick setup, quick clean, heavy duty! Took it camping and made sausage, hash brown, egg burritos for breakfast, burgers for lunch, and then chicken fajitas for dinner. Next day heated up the leftovers on it quick and easy. Worth every penny. Just as good as the other brand except this has a larger surface, 3 burners and lower price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean (while warm, squirt water on it and use a metal spatula to spread it around and clean up...then wipe down with rag) Love that it has a cover included! We keep ours in a sunroom so it helps further protect it. Cooks everything great.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynM

customer_reviews.title: It’s bigger than you might think.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! I love it, but there is definitely a learning curve in getting the heat set right. Burners have to be turned really low to keep from overheating. The griddle is heavy and holds heat quite well.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Cooks hot
customer_reviews.text: Good product I used it camping and was able to cook everything on it. Took me a minute to get used to temperature control ( I started way to hot) easy clean up. Drip pan did not catch 100%of the dripping but it might not been leavel some dripping ended up on the table. Overall I'm happy with it and plan to use it a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Great But. . .
customer_reviews.text: Its a little bigger than I thought gets really hot really quickly gives me a great cook just not entirely portable as advertised if you gotta lug around a large propane tank solved that problem tho pretty good griddle tho
customer_reviews.author: King George

customer_reviews.title: Small Propane Gas Griddle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it's made, I like it's size. My one issue is everything so far has stuck, meet, fish or veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous non stick Easy clean grill!!
customer_reviews.text: We own a large Blackstone flat top. It’s too big for just two people. So we ordered the royal gourmet for our camper. I love the ceramic coating. Absolutely nothing sticks. I can fry eggs on one side and meat on the other and with no problems or sticking. The top is removable for easy cleaning. Have had no problems. I have already suggested this product to a friend who ordered it and absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda callahan

customer_reviews.title: Cook alot at once, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's easy to put together. Disliked the fact that it's pretty heavy and if you dont set it exactly even the oil all goes to the drip pan. I also liked that I can cook for a family of 10 all at once.
customer_reviews.author: jessica baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tailgating and camping!
customer_reviews.text: We love this griddle. Had a little growing pains with it not getting hot enough, but found putting foil around to keep the heat in works perfect! We also put a wood board underneath to protect our plastic table.
customer_reviews.author: msds03

customer_reviews.title: okay but non stick is very sticky
customer_reviews.text: Product made and functions okay but you need to use a lot of oil to keep the food from not permanently sticking to cook top. Will require a paint scraper to clean and hard to get top clean no matter what you use. Heats unevenly and if there is a breeze outside...forget about it. Air gap between fire and cooktop, so if outside the heat up process is slow. Again, it is okay 3 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Griddle top chipped
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used this griddle yet so maybe more stars to come. Straight out of the box the griddle top has several chips around the edge. This is very concerning as we as worried that it will continue to chip and get worse. Other than that it looks very nice and can't wait to use on upcoming camping trip. One thing to pay attention to is that the 3 burner is much larger than I expected. Probably could have gotten away with 2 burner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Cleans up well. Needs wind ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Cleans up well. Needs wind baff8, I'll construct that out of light gauge aluminum or stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Conley, III

customer_reviews.title: Needs better heat distribution designed into the grill . Non stick should be non stick
customer_reviews.text: I like the grill area. The grill is thick. Good looking unit. Easy to set up. I used it twice so far. First time' chicken fajitas. The chicken stuck to the grill. Second time was hash browns and eggs. Lots of oil on the grill and hash browns and eggs still stuck. Before placing the grill over the burners, made sure the igniters worked. Checked the the high and low flame settings all three worked fine. The downside of this grill hot spots and cold spots and food sticking. Plan on buying a longer and better grade gas hose.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel in van nuys

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Product manual is very poor. No instructions on using griddle or what utensils to use. First time using it I cooked sausage, bacon and eggs. Everything STUCK! Eggs stuck so bad ended up scraping them off in th o the trash. I'll try it one more time before it goes in the trash. Won't buy another one of they're products.
customer_reviews.author: An anonymous private person.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This makes the second grill that we have got the first one was electric. We got this gas one so if we loss power we will still be able to cook. They both work great and the food taste so much better cooked on them. So if you have not got one we recommend you get one you will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great price and size
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and heats up quickly. Definitely has hot/cold spots just like any griddle but a laser thermometer makes it easy to use those areas to your advantage. Easy cleanup as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Took this griddle camping. First use even with oil, everything stuck. Cheaply made, back legs bent when trying to move the griddle and just tried to slide it back an inch from the end of table. Would not only NOT recommend but WOULD advise to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: dimegf

customer_reviews.title: Royal Gourmet grill does what it say it does.
customer_reviews.text: When I received my grill, box was a little torn. However the grill was all in tact. Beautiful it heats well, made my products easier to make and customers was really with our food. My grandson whose twelve loves it. He's my cook.
customer_reviews.author: mix match

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I haven't had much opportunity to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I haven't had much opportunity to use this in California as it has been raining for the last forty days and forty nights. However, the Ark is finished and the elephant is nudging me for more pancakes. I find it ironic that the "Blue Rhino" is about to provide pancakes for an impatient elephant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective regulator
customer_reviews.text: I used this one time and loved it. Next time I tried to light it and it would not get any propane through the cheap made regulator that came with it. I pulled the regulator off of my charcoal grill and it worked fine. Shame to have to box and send the complete unit back when all I need is the regulator with hose replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Good to have if power goes out
customer_reviews.text: It is a great unit to have if the power goes out. Easy to set up out of the box. If it had a non-stick surface it would be great. The biggest drawback is with all the burners open all the way, most of the heat is on the right hand side.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his flat top! It’s easily portable and easy to store when we don’t use it. We haven’t taken it camping yet but we are looking forward to more cooking options when camping!
customer_reviews.author: A. Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Father’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our camper because it was a smaller one and portable. We couldn’t be happier with it. My husband uses it all the time. The food is fantastic and it is easy to live around.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom2

customer_reviews.title: Nice table top unit
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is a very good value. My only complaint is the hotspots generated by the burners. A better solution would be 2-3 linear burners instead of the 3 round ones. By no means is this a deal-breaker; the unit still works well.
customer_reviews.author: MotoCampKelly

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he LOVES it!! Wish I would have bought this years ago!! We fixed breakfast on it over the weekend and my husband cooked 3 lbs of bacon in less than 20 minutes!! GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used this yet but came and seems like it will be great. Great quality and plenty big cooking surface for a big family. Can’t wait to start cooking!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean, but great value
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cool space, easy to use, I read all the reviews and was excited to receive this. It’s pretty hard to clean and definitely not non stick, which is frustrating when you’re in a hurry to clean up! Otherwise, totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K Herriage

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This griddle was a huge disappointment. Everything sticks to it, also impossible to cook with uniform heat, with the small round burners. you burn the food directly over the burner almost immediately, the areas away from them don't heat up enough to cook anything. Wish I'd read other reviews first.
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing service--highly recommend this company
customer_reviews.text: Chipped spot in griddle, hoping they can make this right. UPDATE:: Amazing service--highly recommend this company!!! They stand behind their product and make it right. We will use them again when the need arises!! thank you Royal gourmet, not only for the customer service, but for the product. We use this at the lake and it's perfect for cheeseburgers, fajitas, and breakfast items!!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Clean and Keep Clean
customer_reviews.text: Love the porcelain coated finish of the griddle. Heat primarily focused in the back (where the burners are), away from the controls. OK as long as you understand the front is cooler while cooking: the griddle is not the same temperature all over.
customer_reviews.author: John Wesley Hester

customer_reviews.title: Not a very durable product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep in my motorhome and after a 3000 mile trip we found that the legs on the bottom and the frame that the legs screw to are VERY weak. The frame is bent and twisted now. The levelers for the grill were missing upon receipt. I contacted Amazon about the levelers and they compensated me for them. The stove works great and is easy to cook on. Plain and simple this product is great but durable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy,  higher quality than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This was expected to be delivered between 7/3 -710 and arrived 6/28. Super fast delivery! I am very impressed on how well built this 3 burner griddle is. It is solid. I cant wait to fire this beast up. If it works half as well as it looks, it will be 5 stars on my updated review. I honestly was expecting a less quality item for the price. I'm very impressed! Updated review will be at the end of August.

customer_reviews.title: Griddle

Although the griddle stayed lit, the griddle had trouble staying hot with the wind (maybe moving the flame around too much??). Despite these issues, we are pleased with the purchase. We needed a larger cooking surface b/c of the number of people we usually cook for while camping. Easy to assemble and easy to use.

customer_reviews.author: Bellkaj

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage. First it emitted smoke from under the cooking plate right out of the box. Used it two times both times was an absolute failure. The regulator froze and provided intermittent flame. Took a very long time to get hot enough to cook. Second time the metal frame (paint) caught fire then the regulator developed a hole and it began leaking propane. There is no quality to this product. It damn near burned down the tailgate. Too late for a return. Thanks Amazon for pedaling absolute crap.
